instruction: What are the main API endpoints for campaign management?
output:
The RSVP system has the following key API endpoints:

**Campaign Management:**
- GET /api/admin/campaign/campaigns - List all campaigns
- POST /api/admin/campaign/campaigns - Create a new campaign
- GET /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id] - Get campaign details
- PUT /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id] - Update campaign
- DELETE /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id] - Delete campaign
- POST /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id]/schedule - Schedule a campaign
- POST /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id]/pause - Pause a running campaign
- POST /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id]/resume - Resume a paused campaign
- GET /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id]/overview - Get campaign overview analytics
- POST /api/admin/campaign/campaigns/[id]/send-next-batch - Manually trigger next batch send

**Email Template Management:**
- GET /api/admin/campaign/templates - List all templates
- POST /api/admin/campaign/templates - Create a new template
- GET /api/admin/campaign/templates/[id] - Get template details
- PUT /api/admin/campaign/templates/[id] - Update template
- DELETE /api/admin/campaign/templates/[id] - Delete template

**Audience Management:**
- GET /api/admin/campaign/groups - List all audience groups
- POST /api/admin/campaign/groups - Create a new audience group
- GET /api/admin/campaign/groups/[id] - Get audience group details
- PUT /api/admin/campaign/groups/[id] - Update audience group
- DELETE /api/admin/campaign/groups/[id] - Delete audience group
- POST /api/admin/campaign/members/add-to-group - Add members to a group
- POST /api/admin/campaign/members/move - Move members between groups
- POST /api/admin/export - Export audience data

**Workflow Automation:**
- GET /api/admin/workflows - List all workflow rules
- POST /api/admin/workflows - Create a new workflow rule
- GET /api/admin/workflows/[id] - Get workflow rule details
- PUT /api/admin/workflows/[id] - Update workflow rule
- DELETE /api/admin/workflows/[id] - Delete workflow rule
- POST /api/admin/workflows/[id]/toggle - Toggle workflow rule enabled status

**Analytics & Reporting:**
- GET /api/admin/analytics/visitors - Get website visitor analytics
- GET /api/admin/analytics/tracking-links - Get tracking link performance
- GET /api/admin/campaigns/analytics - Get overall campaign analytics

**System & Auth:**
- GET /api/admin/auth/check - Check admin authentication status
- POST /api/admin/auth - Admin login
- POST /api/admin/logout - Admin logout
- GET /api/ai/rag - RAG endpoint for AI context retrieval
